info.title: HotelsDB API Documentation
info.description:
This is HotelsDB API Documentation. 

# Introduction
This API is documented in **Swagger format** and is based on HotelsDB website content provided by **Hotelsdb development team.** 
 Currently, HotelsDB API is not released for public use. It only provides API specification for developer to read and test. 
 For internal use, `API-KEY` header is required for authentication. Error message will display without the key. For more information, please contact out Chief Software Engineer - **Ken Ip** by email.
